project1.title: Top 100 Albums
project1.description: This project will allow the user to login and keep track of albums they have listened to from the Rolling Stone Top 100 Albums of All Time.
project1.technologiesUsed: React, BootStrap, SCSS and Version Control with Github

project2.title: Sorting Hat
project2.description: This project lets you enter your name into a form and get sorted into a Hogwarts House.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
